thread.title: Gregory & Susan
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Gregory & Susan

author: Gregory & Susan
title: Gregory & Susan
text: I haves worked with Herb for a few years now. He is very knowledgeable in current tax laws allowing the maximum return. Herb is prompt and prepares my return when promised. I would not only recommend RG Brenner but definitely would recommend Herb to prepare your taxes
